类的使用
javac.code.Scope

  • 使用Scope的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javac.code  
    javac.comp  
    javac.jvm  
    javac.model  

    • javac.code中Scope的使用

      javac.code中Scope的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Scope.CompoundScope
      A class scope adds capabilities to keep track of changes in related class scopes - this allows client to realize whether a class scope has changed, either directly (because a new member has been added/removed to this scope) or indirectly (i.e. because a new member has been added/removed into a supertype scope)
      static class  Scope.DelegatedScope
      An empty scope, into which you can't place anything.
      static class  Scope.ErrorScope
      An error scope, for which the owner should be an error symbol.
      static class  Scope.ImportScope 
      static class  Scope.StarImportScope 
      声明为Scope的javac.code中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Scope Scope.emptyScope
      A value for the empty scope.
      Scope Symbol.PackageSymbol.members_field 
      Scope Symbol.ClassSymbol.members_field
      a scope for all class members; variables, methods and inner classes type parameters are not part of this scope
      Scope Scope.next
      Next enclosing scope (with whom this scope may share a hashtable)
      Scope Scope.Entry.scope
      The entry's scope.
      返回Scope的javac.code中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Scope Scope.dup()
      Construct a fresh scope within this scope, with same owner, which shares its table with the outer scope.
      Scope Scope.DelegatedScope.dup() 
      Scope Scope.ErrorScope.dup() 
      Scope Scope.dup(Symbol newOwner)
      Construct a fresh scope within this scope, with new owner, which shares its table with the outer scope.
      Scope Scope.CompoundScope.dup(Symbol newOwner) 
      Scope Scope.dupUnshared()
      Construct a fresh scope within this scope, with same owner, with a new hash table, whose contents initially are those of the table of its outer scope.
      Scope Scope.DelegatedScope.dupUnshared() 
      Scope Scope.ErrorScope.dupUnshared() 
      Scope Scope.Entry.getOrigin() 
      Scope Scope.leave()
      Remove all entries of this scope from its table, if shared with next.
      Scope Scope.DelegatedScope.leave() 
      Scope Symbol.members()
      If this is a class or package, its members, otherwise null.
      Scope Symbol.DelegatedSymbol.members() 
      Scope Symbol.PackageSymbol.members() 
      Scope Symbol.ClassSymbol.members() 
      参数类型为Scope的javac.code中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Scope.CompoundScope.addSubScope(Scope that) 
      void Scope.enter(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.DelegatedScope.enter(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.enter(Symbol sym, Scope s, Scope origin, boolean staticallyImported)
      Enter symbol sym in this scope, but mark that it comes from given scope `s' accessed through `origin'.
      void Scope.CompoundScope.enter(Symbol sym, Scope s, Scope origin, boolean staticallyImported) 
      void Scope.StarImportScope.importAll(Scope fromScope) 
      void Scope.ScopeListener.symbolAdded(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.StarImportScope.symbolAdded(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.CompoundScope.symbolAdded(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.ScopeListener.symbolRemoved(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.StarImportScope.symbolRemoved(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      void Scope.CompoundScope.symbolRemoved(Symbol sym, Scope s) 
      参数类型为Scope的javac.code中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DelegatedScope(Scope outer) 
      Entry(Symbol sym, Scope.Entry shadowed, Scope.Entry sibling, Scope scope) 

    • javac.comp中Scope的使用

      参数类型为Scope的javac.comp中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Resolve.printscopes(Scope s)
      print all scopes starting with scope s and proceeding outwards.
